metadata.title: RHSA-2025:0056: kernel-rt security update (Important)
metadata.description:
The kernel-rt packages provide the Real Time Linux Kernel, which enables fine-tuning for systems with extremely high determinism requirements.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: mptcp: cope racing subflow creation in mptcp_rcv_space_adjust (CVE-2024-53122)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: kernel: mptcp: cope racing subflow creation in mptcp_rcv_space_adjust

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.0 Update Services for SAP Solutions
